articles.title: White House hasn’t ruled out Zelensky being in Alaska during Trump-Putin meeting on Friday - CNN
articles.description: A diplomatic scramble unfolded Saturday after President Donald Trump announced he would meet his Russian counterpart, Vladimir Putin, next week in Alaska, as European leaders rushed to understand the terms of the meeting and ensure Ukraine was not being left …

articles.title: COVID has returned to the US and Europe - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: COVID is spreading rapidly across Europe and the US. These are the affected countries and the symptoms of the new variant.

articles.title: Zelenskiy Says Ukraine Won’t Give Up Land to Russia for Peace - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said Kyiv won’t cede territory to end the war with Russia as European leaders pledged their continued support for Ukraine’s sovereignty.
articles.content:
